title: M01-L003 — Fallback Thai Lesson

sections.heading: What you will be able to say after this lesson
body: Provide a deterministic starter lesson artifact pack.

sections.heading: Core phrases (Thai / Transliteration / English)
body: สวัสดี | sà-wàt-dii | hello
ขอบคุณ | khàawp-khun | thank you
ขอโทษ | khǎaw-thôot | excuse me / sorry
ไม่เข้าใจ | mâi khâo-jai | I do not understand
พูดช้าๆ ได้ไหม | phûut cháa-cháa dâai mái | can you speak slowly?

sections.heading: Pronunciation tips (simple and practical)
body: Use สวัสดี sà-wàt-dii to open politely.
Use ขอบคุณ khàawp-khun to close politely.
Use ไม่เข้าใจ mâi khâo-jai when needed.
Add พูดช้าๆ ได้ไหม phûut cháa-cháa dâai mái to control conversation speed.

sections.heading: Mini dialogues / role-play
body: A: สวัสดี | sà-wàt-dii | Hello.
B: สวัสดี | sà-wàt-dii | Hello.
A: ขอบคุณ | khàawp-khun | Thank you.
B: ไม่เข้าใจ | mâi khâo-jai | I do not understand.

sections.heading: Practice drills (self-study)
body: Repeat greeting with confidence.
Say thanks with polite ending.
Repeat repair phrase three times.
Ask for slower speech politely.
